alfredsnippet.snippet:
"When looking at this picture [a QUASAR with a filament attached to a galaxy of much lower red shift] no amount of advanced academic education can substitute for good judgment; in fact it would undoubtedly be an impediment."

- Halton Arp, Seeing Red
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Halton Arp on Advanced Academic Education
